name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente.
In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, grated Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
In a pan, cook chopped bacon until crispy. Remove excess fat.
Add cooked spaghetti to the pan with bacon. Mix well.
Remove pan from heat and quickly stir in the egg and cheese mixture until it coats the pasta evenly. The residual heat will cook the eggs and create a creamy sauce.
Season with salt and additional black pepper if desired. Serve hot.
